p: These indices vary in their ability to evaluate heat stress. For example, for humid climates, indices with a larger weighting for humidity are used (Bohmanova et al., 2007). Generally, the lower threshold THI value for cattle is 72 (Bohmanova, Misztal, Tsuruta, Norman, & Lawlor, 2008). For purebred and crosses of Bos taurus cattle, HLI from 70 to 96 indicates thermoneutral to extreme heat load conditions (Gaughan, et al., 2010).
